title: Single Family Detached for Sale in Westmount
description:
Ideally located in the heart of middle Westmount, this lovely semi-detached well maintained family home has it all. Boasting hardwood floors, original old world charm, high ceilings, large living and dining room, 4+2 bedrooms, 3+1 bathrooms, 2nd floor solarium with panoramic views, and a sun filled eat-in kitchen, terrace and private garden, finished basement, 1 garage and covered outdoor parking. A must see!

Welcome to 4876 Westmount Ave. in the heart of middle Westmount close to Victoria Village, schools, parks and so much more!
Enter this lovely semi-detached family home with old world charm. The home has been well maintained and up-dated where functionality meets refined architectural details.
The ground floor offers voluminous interior living spaces with a formal living room and dining room perfect for entertaining and day to day living. There are high ceilings and hardwood floors on all levels. An exquisitely bright and functional eat-in kitchen features a timeless white quartz countertop that pairs superbly with the white backsplash. From the kitchen there is access to a large terrace and private backyard with a cozy garage-top terrace. The ground floor is complete with a powder room.
The second floor boasts a sunny staircase with a dazzling skylight. A grand master bedroom that provides an atmosphere of serenity with a walk-in closet and a sunroom. The second bedroom is equipped with a fireplace and a dressing room and charming balcony. There are two additional bedrooms and a family bathroom on this floor.
The basement is finished with a back entrance leading to the backyard. There is a family room, two bedrooms and a bathroom with a laundry area on this level.
Declarations: - All fireplaces need to be verified by the buyer and are sold without any warranty with respect to their compliance with applicable regulations and insurance company requirements. - The choice of building inspector to be agreed upon by both parties prior to inspection.
address: 4876 Av. Westmount, Westmount, QC H3Y 1Y1

title: Single Family Detached for Sale in La Prairie
description:
Nestled in the esteemed neighborhood of Symbiocité in La Prairie, this stunning modern townhouse offers an inviting haven for your family. With 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, and a convenient powder room, this home is designed for both comfort and elegance. High-quality construction and superior finishes ensure a luxurious living experience.
Symbiocité, the newest and most coveted sector in La Prairie, is renowned for its serene streets and vibrant community. Just a short walk from the ice rink and numerous parks, you'll find endless activities for the entire family to enjoy. Everything you need is within reach, including the CPE, École de la Petite-Garde, and Collège Jean de La Mennais. Additionally, you'll have quick access to Quartier Dix30 in Brossard and the REM station, making commuting a breeze. Embrace a lifestyle of convenience and tranquility in this exceptional home.
address: 75 Rue du Vice Roi, La Prairie, QC J5R 0T1

title: Condo for Sale in Ville-Marie
description: Impressive condo located in the Heart of Downtown Montreal. Beautiful two bedroom unit with the views of downtown. Scavolini kitchen, outdoor pool on the rooftop with panoramic views, gym. Perfect location, close to the restaurants, shoppingmall and universities.
address: 1211 Rue Drummond #805, Montréal, QC H3G 0E6

title: Condo for Sale in Ville-Marie
description:
Welcome to your dream home at 1788 Rue Joseph-Manseau, Apt. 106, a stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo that offers the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. This modern and stylish property was built in 2018, and it's located in heart of Montreal.
Upon entering the home, you'll be greeted by a spacious and inviting living area that's perfect for relaxing or entertaining. With 933.23 square feet of living space, this condo is the perfect size for those who want to enjoy all the benefits of city living without feeling cramped or confined.
The open-concept kitchen is a chef's dream, with stainless steel appliances, qurtz countertops, and plenty of cabinet space for storage. Whether you're cooking a gourmet meal or simply grabbing a quick snack, this kitchen has everything you need.
The master bedroom is a true oasis, featuring a large closet, plenty of natural light, and an en-suite bathroom with a spacious shower. The second bedroom is perfect for a home office or a guest room, and the second bathroom is located just steps away for added convenience.
This condo also boasts a private balcony that's perfect for enjoying a morning coffee or an evening drink while taking in the stunning city views. Other features of this property include in-unit laundry and a secure parking space.
Located in the heart of Ville-Marie, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, shops, and attractions. Priced at $650,000, this property is the perfect choice for those who want to enjoy all the benefits of city living without sacrificing comfort or style. Don't miss your chance to make this stunning condo your new home - schedule a viewing today and see for yourself what makes this property so special.
address: 1788 Rue Joseph-Manseau, Apt. 106, Ville-Marie, QC

title: Condo for Sale in Ville-Marie
description: Amazing condo in the heart of downtown Montreal. Cozy and sunny livingroom with large windows. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a balcony, wood floor and modern finishes. Soundproof concrete building with gym, outdoor swimming pool and electronic key access. Close to different metro stations, green line Guy-Concordia and orange line Lucien d'Allier.
address: 1190 Rue MacKay, Apt. 314, Ville-Marie, QC

title: Condo for Sale in Ville-Marie
description:
In the heart of downtown Montreal, steps away from McGill and Concordia University, shopping center, restaurants, bars, museum, parks, groceries, transportation. The building has gorgeous rooftop terrace with BBQ to enjoy the summer, fully equipped gym. Good investment and enjoy the downtown living.

CONDO
- Located on the 8th floor - View of downtown and Mont Royal - High-end finishes - Quartz counter - Stainless steel electric appliances
BUILDING
- Rooftop terrace with BBQ - Fully equipped gym - Steps away from McGill and Concordia University, shopping center, restaurants, bars, museum, parks, groceries, transportation.
address: 1205 Rue MacKay, Apt. 810, Ville-Marie, QC

title: Condo for Sale in Ville-Marie
description: Amazing condo in the heart of downtown Montreal. One bedrooms one bathroom with large windows, face south and west side, lots of sunny during whole afternoon, spacious bathroom with shower, a balcony, wood floor and modern finishes. Outdoor swimming pool on the 6th floor, roof terrace, Gym. Close to all services and amenities, universities, Lucien-L'Allier train station and metro stations, public transport, shopping centers, Concordia and Mcgill universities.centers and much more!
address: 1190 Rue MacKay, Apt. 1406, Ville-Marie, QC

title: Condo for Rent in Le Sud-Ouest
description:
Brand new condo in a luxury condo building. A stunning studio in the Griffintown
Built in 2024, this condo boasts modern design, high-end finishes, and 298 square feet of living space, making it the perfect choice for young professionals, students or those who prefer a minimalist lifestyle.
Located in the heart of Griffintown, next to the water. Close to downtown and old port, close to large supermarket, pharmacy, banks and restaurants. Close to ALL. Common area: gym, roof top swimming pool, terrace, BBQ, etc.
address: 1485 Rue des Bassins, Apt. 728, Le Sud-Ouest, Quebec, H3J0C2 Canada

title: Condo for Rent in Le Sud-Ouest
description: Luxurious living in Maestria Project. Perched on the 49th floor, this Studio offers amazing city's view. The space is enhanced by contemporary design elements, floor-to-ceiling windows, and 9-foot ceilings. Take advantage of unique amenities such as suspended Skybridge, pools, spas, a gym, a business center, WiFi-enabled lounges, a games room, and virtual golf. Situated in downtown Montreal's shopping district, near Place des Spectacles, Place des Arts, UQÀM & Mcgill Universities, Metro station!
address: 1210 Rue Jeanne-Mance, Apt. 4916, Ville-Marie, QC

title: Condo for Rent in Brossard
description: Excellent two story condo located on Brossard section L! 2 bedrooms + big mezzanine that could become a third bedroom or a nice work space depending on your needs, located on the last floor, 1 garage + 1 outdoor parking space. Close to Quartier Dix30 and 2 minutes away from the future REM station that will let you get to downtown Montreal in less than 15 minutes.
address: 5330 Rue de Leslie, Apt. 4, Brossard, Québec, J4Y0N2 Canada
